00050 CompositeOFScalarAdd::CompositeOFScalarAdd( double alp, 
00051                                             ObjectiveFunction* Obj1,
00052                                             bool delete_OF)
00053   : deleteObjFunc(delete_OF)
00054 {
00055   objFunc=Obj1;
00056   mAlpha=alp;
00057 }

00060 //Michael:  need to clean up here
00061 CompositeOFScalarAdd::~CompositeOFScalarAdd(){
00062   if (deleteObjFunc)
00063     delete objFunc;
00064 }

00066 ObjectiveFunction* CompositeOFScalarAdd::clone() const
00067   { return new CompositeOFScalarAdd( mAlpha, objFunc->clone(), true ); }

00082 bool CompositeOFScalarAdd::initialize_block_coordinate_descent( 
00083                                                        MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00084                                                        const Settings* settings,
00085                                                        PatchSet* user_set,
00086                                                        MsqError& err )
00087 {
00088   bool rval = objFunc->initialize_block_coordinate_descent( mesh_and_domain, settings, user_set, err );
00089   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00090 }
00091 
00092 bool CompositeOFScalarAdd::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00093                                      PatchData& pd,
00094                                      double& value_out,
00095                                      bool free,
00096                                      MsqError& err )
00097 {
00098   bool ok = objFunc->evaluate( type, pd, value_out, free, err );
00099   value_out += mAlpha;
00100   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && ok;
00101 }
